report_statement.statement_text: The European Parliament Warns that it will be difficult to apply the MSY model to multispecies fisheries (i.e. the majority of those in the EU), since if the MSY applied were that of the main species the others could be overfished, while if, as would seem logical, one applied that of the most vulnerable species it would be necessary to stop catching those species that were in a good biological state, with adverse effects in economic, employment and competitiveness terms, a situation which would be in total contradiction with the notion of MSY as such;
